au_86174: up <command>

up echo $(date) "eth0 up" >>  /var/log/journal
down echo $(date) "eth0 down" >> /var/log/journal

su_1511343: ip link add eth0.10 link eth0 type vlan id 10
ip link set eth0.10 up

ul_122671: function tunnel {
  local name="$1" self_ipv4="$2" self_ipv6="$3" ipv4="$4" ipv6="$5"
  ip tunnel add "$name" mode sit ttl 64 remote "$ipv4" local "$self_ipv4"
  ip -6 addr add "$self_ipv6"1 dev "$name"
  ip -6 route add "$ipv6"/64 dev "$name" metric 1
  ip link set "$name" up
}
